    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BBQChicken
    This class represents a BBQ Chicken pizza which extends the Pizza class.
    BuildYourOwn
    This class represents a Build Your Own pizza which extends Pizza class.
    ChicagoController
    This class handles the Chicago pizza-related functionality in the RU Pizzeria application.
    ChicagoPizza
    The ChicagoPizza class implements the PizzaFactory interface and provides methods for creating various types of pizzas specific to the Chicago style.
    Crust
    The Crust enum represents various types of pizza crusts available in the pizzeria.
    CurrentOrdersController
    Controller class for managing the current pizza orders.
    Deluxe
    The Deluxe class represents a type of pizza with a predefined set of premium toppings.
    MainPageController
    This class serves as the controller for the main page of the RU Pizzeria application.
    Meatzza
    The Meatzza class represents a type of pizza with a variety of meat toppings.
    MenuController
    The MenuController class handles the interactions and behaviors for the menu view in the RU Pizzeria application.
    NewYorkController
    Controller class for managing New York style pizza creation and ordering.
    NYPizza
    The NYPizza class implements the PizzaFactory interface and provides methods for creating various types of pizzas specific to the New York style.
    Order
    The Order class represents a customer's pizza order, containing an order number and a list of pizzas in the order.
    OrdersPlacedController
    The OrdersPlacedController class manages the "Orders Placed" view in the RU Pizzeria application.
    Pizza
    The Pizza class represents a general pizza with attributes for toppings, crust type, and size.
    PizzaFactory
    The PizzaFactory interface defines methods for creating different types of pizzas.
    PizzeriaMain
     
    Size
    The Size enum represents the possible sizes for a pizza.
    Topping
    The Topping enum represents various toppings that can be added to a pizza.
